ModMetaData.name: GeneticRim Cosmic Horrors Patch
ModMetaData.author: Sarg
ModMetaData.description:
Extract DNA from animals and hybridize them to create new, exotic species!
<size=24>Features</size> - Adds eight hybrids between vanilla creatures and monsters from the Call of Cthulhu - Cosmic Horrors mod! - Adds a new machine, the Eldritch genepod, to mix genes from eldritch abominations and create your hybrids.
<size=24>Load Order</size> - As with all patch mods, be sure to call it after Call of Cthulhu - Cosmic Horrors mod and GeneticRim mod, or else you'll get some errors.
<size=24>Compatibility</size> Made compatible with A Dog Said using the auto patcher: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=944381237 Should be savegame compatible and not break anything. Should!
<size=24>Credit</size> Credit goes to jecrell for all his awesome work on Rimworld.
<size=24>Changelog</size> v1.0: Release (19/9/17)
